description: BR-32 is the official District Transport Office for Madhubani, situated in the heart of Bihar's Mithila region. The office manages vehicle registration, licensing, and road safety enforcement for the district, which is notable for its proximity to the Indo-Nepal border and its world-famous Madhubani art heritage. It plays a vital role in regulating commercial traffic and transport infrastructure across North Bihar.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Bhoop Narayan Singh Colony, Madhubani, Bihar
